name: Competitive Framework
description: A selection of curated mods#ripe for competitive gameplay!

mods.name: Adaptation
mods.description: Kill loop bosses to#reroll your mutations!#Find the perfect#skill set!

mods.name: Feels Like Vanilla
mods.description: 16 simple but unique#vanilla-style weapons#with a wide range of#designs and functions.

mods.name: Blaacskills
mods.description: A set of weapon mutations#that expand the pool and#provide new meta opportunities!

mods.name: LOMuts
mods.description: Lots of Mutations!#What it sounds like on the tin.#Adds a third ultra#to all characters!

mods.name: Portalspeed
mods.description: When you clear a level,#get a speed boost#to get to the#next level faster!

mods.name: Varia 10k
mods.description: A semi-esoteric original-character#based weapon pack that adds#over 80 wild and powerful weapons.

mods.name: B Mutation Tweaks
mods.description: A set of tweaks#to vanilla mutations by blaac.

mods.name: B Weapon Tweaks
mods.description: A bunch of QOL changes#to vanilla weapons by blaac.
